short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'MetricMaster' is a powerful Chrome extension that lets you easily convert units of measurement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With MetricMaster, users can effortlessly compare various measurement units, making unit conversions a breeze. Whether you need to convert length, weight, volume, or any other unit, MetricMaster has got you covered, providing accurate and instant results. But that's not all! This versatile extension also offers a convenient search bar Provided by Microsoft Bing, allowing users to seamlessly explore the web without leaving their browser. Enhance your browsing experience with MetricMaster, the ultimate measurement conversion and search tool.

By clicking “ADD TO CHROME”, I accept and agree to install the MetricMaster extension and set Chrome's new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in our Terms of Use and Privacy policy 

Privacy Policy: https://mild-ads.com/Privacy-Policy/
Terms of Use: https://mild-ads.com/Terms-and-Conditions/

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
